title: XenolibAxes
description:
XenolibAxes is a test to measure your political ideology against that of my good friend Bea, whom this test is coded for :D
 Basically you get to see how close you're ideology is to hers through placement on the axes she values in relation to her ideology. Her page can be found here: https://polcompballanarchy.miraheze.org/wiki/Xenolibertarianism
valDescription: There are nine independent axes - Value, Genetics, Unity, Government, Authorization, Mind, Religion, Leaders, Climate - and each has two opposing values assigned to them. They are:
